lead.p: slice â€” Copies a piece out of an array and returns it.

return.p: The copied piece of the array.

example.heading: slice example
example.code: var array = [2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64]; console.log(array.slice()); // [2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64] console.log(array.slice(2)); // [8, 16, 32, 64] console.log(array.slice(2, 2)); // [] console.log(array.slice(2, 5)); // [8, 16, 32] console.log(array); // [2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64]
